original_text: Make sure the site requires a prescription and has a pharmacist available for questions. Buy only from licensed pharmacies located in the United States. BeSafeRx: Know Your Online Pharmacy has more in...

qa_pairs.text_input: What factors should I consider when buying medicines online?
qa_pairs.output: Buy only from licensed pharmacies located in the United States that require a prescription and have a pharmacist available for questions.

qa_pairs.text_input: How can I protect my personal information when buying medicines online?
qa_pairs.output: Don't provide personal information such as credit card numbers unless you are sure the site will protect them.

qa_pairs.text_input: Where can I find more information about finding safe and legal online pharmacies?
qa_pairs.output: BeSafeRx: Know Your Online Pharmacy has more information about finding safe and legal online pharmacies.
